programme.desc: Brand new series: An unexpected arrival at the retreat leads to a showdown. And as a marital breakdown spirals, everyone's caught in the crossfire at an explosive dinner party.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's Commitment Ceremony time and some couples reap the rewards from their time away. But for others, turmoil takes hold... is one marriage beyond repair?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's time for spouse swapping and bed hopping! Absence makes one groom's heart grow especially fonder, but tests one relationship to the brink of destruction.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: In the aftermath of partner swaps, the dinner party serves up romantic realisations for some but plummeting problems for others. Is this the end for one couple?

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Great Christmas Bake Off 2024
programme.desc: Natalie Cassidy, Chris Bisson, Dean Gaffney, Shobna Gulati and Sheree Murphy take on three festive challenges. Who'll just about cobble something together, and who'll be Queen Vic-torious?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Walking Big & Tall: Marge urges Homer to lose weight. Instead, he finds a support group that encourages him to embrace his size. Lisa writes an anthem for Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Fare Lady: Fed up with the thankless task of chauffeuring her kids around, Marge begins working as a driver for a ride-sharing service. Homer runs Moe's bar for a night.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Time to play happy families as Homestays get underway! Warm welcomes and straight-talking friends await, but a scandal threatens to blow one marriage apart.

programme.title: New: MAFS UK: It's Official!...
programme.desc: ...With Lucinda Light: Brand new series - Lucinda's joined by Russell Kane to debrief partner swaps, homestays and belly dancing. And bride Nelly chats about that 'for now' moment.

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: (2018) Unrestrained reboot of the franchise defined by a ruthless extraterrestrial killer whose name says it all... and it's had a DNA upgrade. All the better to kill you with, my dear.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Time to play happy families as Homestays get underway! Warm welcomes and straight-talking friends await, but a scandal threatens to blow one marriage apart.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: To mark 30 years of the iconic soap, five Hollyoaks stars compete for charity. Will McQueen matriarch Nicole Barber-Lane's tropical night be a slice of paradise? (Ep1/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Will Isabelle Smith's guests go crazy for her Mad Hatter's Tea Party? And how can you win the best Soap Newcomer Award again and again? (Ep2/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: James Redmond - aka Rory Finnigan - hosts a Scouse-themed night. This isn't his first Come Dine with Me rodeo, but will he break a record and Finn-ish last, again? (Ep3/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Anya Lawrence - aka Vicky Grant - takes her guests to Greece with a mezze of mouthwatering munch and memories, and impresses with a legendary surprise guest! (Ep4/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Charlie Wernham hosts an East End night, in a portable kitchen, on the Hollyoaks set! Let's hope his seafood isn't damp squib! And who's won the week? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: As residents confront the fallout of an explosive week, guilt consumes Donny and tensions rise among the teens. The hospital faces an intruder alert, and heartbreak follows in the mortuary.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: With the truth finally out, Donny's consumed by guilt and plans to flee Hollyoaks. Meanwhile, the teens return to the village, but worries and hidden secrets cause tensions...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Billy Corkhill finds that Hollyoaks has much in common with Brookside Close. With the hospital on intruder alert, heartbreak follows in the mortuary, and a confession takes a shocking turn.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Return to Amy's Baking Company: Gordon revisits the most contentious restaurant he's ever tried to rescue - Amy's Baking Company, in Scottsdale, Arizona.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Time to play happy families as Homestays get underway! Warm welcomes and straight-talking friends await, but a scandal threatens to blow one marriage apart.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Now Museum, Now You Don't: Lisa explores the wonders of western art. She becomes Lisanardo, and Bart turns into a French impressionist.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Anxiety Optimization: When Sheldon gets stuck in a rut with his research, he asks his friends to cure his mental block by raising his stress levels.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Troll Manifestation: Leonard and Sheldon co-publish a physics paper but are forced to defend themselves against negative comments from an online critic.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Party Crasher: With the baby coming, Jay and Gloria go to great lengths to throw Manny an extra-special surprise 14th birthday party - and there are plenty of surprises indeed.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Fulgencio: Gloria's mum and sister visit from Colombia, and they come bearing traditions, baby names and a whole lot of family baggage.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tenant Disassociation: Leonard competes with Sheldon to become president of the tenants' association. Howard and Raj find a drone in the back garden.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Reclusive Potential: A brilliant scientist invites Sheldon to his isolated cabin, and Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Comet Polarization: Sheldon isn't pleased by the comic book shop's new-found popularity. Raj tries to take the credit for Penny's astronomical discovery.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Monetary Insufficiency: Sheldon goes to Las Vegas to try to win money for science. Penny and Bernadette take Amy shopping for a wedding dress.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Lights Out: The entire squad is on high alert when a massive blackout hits Brooklyn.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Good Ones: The eighth and final series. Amy returns from maternity leave and Jake and Rosa work a difficult case.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Yokel Hero: Cletus becomes a singing sensation, while Homer becomes a new man. But when Cletus turns on his fans he ruins everything.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Do Pizza Bots Dream of Electric Guitars: Homer tries to reunite a mechanical band from his youth, but film and TV creator JJ Abrams gets hold of them first.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Time to play happy families as Homestays get underway! Warm welcomes and straight-talking friends await, but a scandal threatens to blow one marriage apart.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The D & D Vortex: When the gang find out that Wil Wheaton is hosting a celebrity game of Dungeons & Dragons at his home, deception and betrayal take hold.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge Gamer: Marge gets hooked on an online fantasy game and discovers that Bart is the game's best - and most destructive - player.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Boys of Bummer: Just as the Springfield Isotopes are on the verge of winning their first Little League Championship, Bart makes a mistake that costs the team their title.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Donny's world is shattered by a shocking revelation. Leela offers kindness to another resident in the wake of the plane crash. And in hospital, a new mother continues to spiral.

programme.title: New: MAFS UK Does Come Dine
programme.desc: with Me: Brand new series - It's bite at first sight as culinary competitiveness meets marriage mayhem! Will Emma Barnes' wedding-inspired menu be a match made in heaven? (Ep1/5)

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.desc: Welcome to High Fashion: The stakes are high and the heels even higher in Tyra Banks' iconic reality series, as 32 wannabe models are whittled down to just 14.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: As Homestays continue, an emotional mum expresses unease, and friend feedback falls flat. And how will one bride cope with her family's commitment concerns?

programme.title: New: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: A furious Yas accuses Beks of betraying her with Sam Prince. Sparks re-ignite between Livvy and Chuggs. And can Demi and Jules build bridges for Jazz's sake?

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: (1989) Fantasy horror with Julian Sands and Richard E Grant. Using magic, an evil warlock flees to 80s LA from the olde-worlde. Can he unmake creation before a witch-finder tracks him down?

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death
programme.desc: (1964) Horror with Vincent Price and Jane Asher, based on an Edgar Allen Poe story. Satanist Prince Prospero treats people like puppets. But he can't escape the coming plague.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: (1965) A spin-off of the cult television series starring Peter Cushing. Backyard-inventor Dr Who finds himself stuck on the irradiated planet Skaro, home of the cold and metallic Daleks.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: (2009) Action adventure with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston. Terrorists steal a devastating weapon and only the USA's finest - the GI Joes - can stop them.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: (2022) Creepy-doll horror with Allison Williams. A robotics engineer simultaneously invents an AI dolly and takes on the care of her orphaned niece. But can a cyborg really raise a kid?

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: (2021) Tom Hardy returns as Marvel's gnarly antihero, to face a symbiote spawned from Venom's own blood living inside a serial killer who looks just like Woody Harrelson. Yikes.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: (2019) Horror based on Stephen King's novel. Seeking a quiet life, a family moves to a rural setting. But there's a road with speeding trucks and a pet cemetery that resurrects the dead...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: First Knight
programme.desc: (1995) Romantic drama based on Arthurian legend, starring Richard Gere, Sean Connery and Julia Ormond. Can nomadic swordsman Lancelot contain his love for King Arthur's fiance?

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the...
programme.desc: ...Fallen: (2009) Raucous sci-fi action sequel with Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox. Can Sam and Mikaela prevent the scourge of the Decepticon robots from destroying the Earth?

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: (2011) Romantic drama. Jim Sturgess and Anne Hathaway star as friends whose lives intertwine and diverge over the years, after first meeting as graduates in 1988.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Good Boys
programme.desc: (2019) Coming-of-age comedy about three young boys embarking on a brand new, terrifying adventure: sixth grade. Girls, kissing and an epic four-mile journey await.

programme.title: Moneyboys
programme.desc: (2021) Gritty drama set in South China following the life of a male sex worker who must juggle the demands of his family, while keeping how he supports them a secret. In Mandarin/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Deaf Funny
programme.desc: Comedy sketch show in BSL with a variety of characters, including a deaf man looking for love, a deaf spy and an interpreter. (Ep2)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: (1952) Poignant Ealing drama starring seven-year-old Mandy Miller as a deaf girl whose parents - played by Phyllis Calvert and Terence Morgan - fight over her treatment.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: (1954) Crime-comedy starring Alec Guinness. A priest is tasked with accompanying a priceless religious artifact from London to Rome. But the prolific thief Flambeau is hot on his trail...

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: (1954) Classic Second World War drama. John Mills, Lionel Jeffries and Bryan Forbes star as just some of the POWs determined to break out of the infamous German 'escape-proof' prison.

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: (1984) John Carpenter's sci-fi romance with Jeff Bridges and Karen Allen. An alien is stranded on Earth, where he assumes the form of a widow's dead husband - and finds the locals hostile.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: (2022) Daisy Edgar-Jones stars in director Olivia Newman's adaptation of Delia Owens' best-selling novel about a feral child who's accused of murder in America's Deep South. Did she do it?

programme.title: How I Live Now
programme.desc: (2012) Saoirse Ronan and George MacKay star in director Kevin Macdonald's romance-thriller about a US teen who falls in love just as Europe tips into war. Very strong language.
